org.parboiled.support
Class Characters

java.lang.Object
  org.parboiled.support.Characters

public class Characters
extends Object

An immutable, set-like aggregation of (relatively few) characters that allows for an inverted semantic (all chars except these few) and proper treatment of the special characters defined in Chars.

Method Detail

add

@NotNull
public Characters add(char c)
Adds the given character to the set. If c is Chars.ANY all characters except Chars.EMPTY will be added.

Parameters:
c - the character to add
Returns:
a new Characters object

remove

@NotNull
public Characters remove(char c)
Removes the given character to the set. If c is Chars.ANY all characters except Chars.EMPTY will be removed.

Parameters:
c - the character to remove
Returns:
a new Characters object

contains

public boolean contains(char c)
Checks whether this instance contains the given character. If c is Chars.ANY the method will only return true if all non-EOI and non-EMPTY characters are actually included.

Parameters:
c - the character to check for
Returns:
true if this instance contains c

add

@NotNull
public Characters add(@NotNull
                              Characters other)
Returns a new Characters object containing all the characters of this instance plus all characters of the given instance.

Parameters:
other - the other Characters to add
Returns:
a new Characters object

remove

@NotNull
public Characters remove(@NotNull
                                 Characters other)
Returns a new Characters object containing all the characters of this instance minus all characters of the given instance.

Parameters:
other - the other Characters to remove
Returns:
a new Characters object

of

@NotNull
public static Characters of(char c)
Creates a new Characters instance containing only the given char or, if c is Chars.ANY, or all non-EOI, non-EMPTY characters.

Parameters:
c - the char
Returns:
a new Characters object

of

@NotNull
public static Characters of(char... chars)
Creates a new Characters instance containing only the given chars. Chars.ANY will be expanded to all non-EOI, non-EMPTY characters if it is contained in the given array.

Parameters:
chars - the chars
Returns:
a new Characters object

allBut

@NotNull
public static Characters allBut(char c)
Creates a new Characters instance containing all characters (including Chars.EOI and Chars.EMPTY) minus the given one.

Parameters:
c - the char to NOT include
Returns:
a new Characters object

allBut

@NotNull
public static Characters allBut(char... chars)
Creates a new Characters instance containing all characters (including Chars.EOI and Chars.EMPTY) minus the given ones.

Parameters:
chars - the chars to NOT include
Returns:
a new Characters object
